title: Reading on
creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development and Stephen Skok
brief_description: Follow up to “Beginning Reading” which looked at reading in the infant school. This program looks at strategies for the teaching of reading from Years 3-7. Practising clasroom teachers present their individual approaches for the teaching of reading at these levels.
